description: After the festival everyone went to sleep, so it`s time for Reki to make her final decision. Rakka is shocked by the revelation and successfully expelled from the dark room. The final battle will be fought with a piece of paper, an open window, a book, and a faint memory from the cocoon. Will the stone be torn apart when the light arrives?

titles.title: レキの世界・祈り・終章
